sql.value: select img as img, id as id, name as name ,code as code, tb_remain_count as tbRemainCount, email_send_name as emailSendName, email_send_address as emailSendAddress, marketing_append_email as marketingAppendEmail, marketing_append_mobiles as marketingAppMobile, app_key as appKey, app_secret as appSecret from sys_group where 1=1

select b.id as id,b.code as code,b.parent_id as parentId,b.parent_ids as parentIds,b.name as name,b.type as `type`,b.icon as icon,b.sort as sort,b.url as url from sys_position_menu a,sys_menu b where a.menu_id=b.id and a.position_code=#{positionCode} and b.parent_id!=0 and b.state=1
select sg.name as name from sys_group sg where 1=1

select sse.code as shopCode,sse.name as shopName from sys_shop_ext sse left join sys_position_shop sps on sse.code = sps.shop_code left join sys_user_department sud on sud.position_code = sps.position_code left join sys_user su on su.id = sud.user_id where sse.state=1 and su.id=#{id} and sse.plat_from_type = 1 or sse.plat_from_type = 101
select code as shopCode,name as shopName from sys_shop_ext where 1=1
select shop_count as shopCount, id as id, name as shopName, code as shopCode,brand_id as brandId from sys_shop where 1=1

select s.id, s.name as shopname, s.code as shopcode, s.group_id as groupid, s.out_sid as outsid, e.app_key as appkey,e.app_secret as appsecret ,e.access_token as accesstoken, e.uid as uid, e.plat_from_type as platfromtype, s.brand_id as brandId from sys_shop s inner join sys_shop_ext e on s.code= e.code where 1=1
select DISTINCT id as id, parent_id as parentId,code as shopCode,name as shopName,brand_id as brandId from sys_shop where is_shop =1
select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code from sys_shop where 1=1
select id as id,name as shopName, parent_id as parentId, code as shopCode from sys_shop where 1=1
select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code,id as ref,if(is_shop = 1, true,false) as showAdd from sys_shop where 1=1

if.value: and is_shop=0 or is_shop = 1 and code in (${'shopCodes'})

sql.value: select i.id as id,i.name as label, i.parent_id as parentId, i.code as code from sys_shop i left join sys_shop_ext sse on i.code = sse.code where 1=1 and i.is_shop = 1
select i.id as id,i.name as label, i.parent_id as parentId, os.out_code as code,i.code as shopcode from sys_shop i left join out_shop os on i.out_sid = os.id where 1=1 and i.is_shop = 1
select os.id as id,os.out_name as label, os.out_code as code from out_shop os where 1=1 and os.id not in (select out_sid from sys_shop)
select s.id as id,s.name as label, s.parent_id as parentId, s.code as code,s.id as ref,if(s.is_shop = 1, true,false) as showAdd from sys_shop s left join sys_shop_ext se on s.code=se.code where 1 = 1

if.value: and (s.is_shop=0 or s.is_shop =1 and s.brand_id in (${brandIds}))
and (s.is_shop=0 or s.is_shop = 1 and s.code in (${'shopCodes'}))

sql.value: select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code,id as ref,if(is_shop = 1, true,false) as showAdd from sys_shop where 1=1
select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code,id as ref,if(is_shop = 1, true,false) as showAdd from sys_shop where 1=1
select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code from sys_department where 1=1
select name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as id from sys_department where state =1
select id as id,name as label, parent_id as parentId, code as code from sys_department where 1=1
select *,code as shopCode,name as shopName,open_shop_id as openShopId,out_sid as tbSid from sys_shop_ext where 1=1 and state = 1

select name ,uid, plat_from_type as platFromType, code,app_key as appKey,app_secret as appSecret,access_token as accessToken, jl_session_key as jlSessionKey,jlkey_expire_time as jlkeyExpireTime from sys_shop_ext where 1=1 and state = 1
select * from sys_shop_ext join sys_position_shop on sys_position_shop.shop_code =sys_shop_ext.`code` where 1=1
select se.*,s.code as shopCode,s.name as shopName from sys_shop s inner join sys_shop_ext se on s.code = se.code where s.state = 1
select code from sys_department where id=#{id}

select distinct sb.id as brandId, sb.brand_name as brandName,sb.logo,sb.remark from sys_brand sb inner join sys_shop ss on sb.id=ss.brand_id inner join sys_position_shop sps on sps.shop_code=ss.code inner join sys_user_department sud on sps.department_code like concat(sud.department_code,'%') where sb.state=sps.state=sud.state=1 and sud.user_id=#{userId}

select a.id as id,a.code as code,a.parent_id as parentId,a.parent_ids as parentIds,a.name as name,a.type as `type`,a.icon as icon,a.sort as sort,a.url as url from sys_menu a inner join sys_position_menu b on a.id=b.menu_id inner join (select id from sys_menu where code=#{code}) c on a.parent_id=c.id where b.position_code=#{positionCode} and a.state=1
select id as brandId, brand_name as brandName,logo,remark from sys_brand where 1 = 1
select user_name as k , id as v from sys_user
select s.* from sys_user s where id= #{id}
select id as id,parent_id as parentId,code as shopCode,name as shopName from sys_shop where state = 1

select s.out_sid as outSid,ext.app_key as appKey,ext.app_secret as appSecret,ext.access_token as accessToken,ext.plat_from_type as platFromType,ext.id,ext.uid,ext.name,ext.jl_session_key,ext.jlkey_expire_time from sys_shop_ext ext inner join sys_shop s on s.code = ext.code where ext.code = #{code} and ext.state = 1

select sys_shop_ext.id as id,sys_shop.group_id as groupId,brand_id as brandId,access_token as accessToken,app_key as appKey,app_secret as appSecret ,plat_from_type as platFromType, uid ,sys_shop_ext.name,sys_shop.code from sys_shop_ext join sys_shop on sys_shop.code = sys_shop_ext.code where sys_shop_ext.state=1 and is_syn=1
select id as id, access_token as accessToken,app_key as appKey,app_secret as appSecret ,plat_from_type as platFromType, uid ,name,code from sys_shop_ext where state=1 and is_syn=1
select d.department_code, u.user_name as v, u.id as k from sys_user u, sys_user_department d where u.state = 1 and u.id = d.user_id and d.department_code = #{department_code}

select u.id,u.login_account as loginAccount,u.password,u.user_name as userName,u.group_id as groupId,p.code as positionCode from sys_user u inner join sys_user_department udept on udept.user_id=u.id inner join sys_position p on p.code=udept.position_code where 1=1
select u.id,u.login_account as loginAccount,u.password,u.user_name as userName,u.group_id as groupId from sys_user u where 1=1
select name as shopName from sys_shop where 1=1

select shop.code ,shop.name from sys_shop shop inner join sys_position_shop ps on shop.code like concat(ps.shop_code,'%') inner join sys_department dept on ps.department_code like concat(dept.code,'%') where 1=1
select * from kd_brand_authorize where 1 = 1
select department_code from sys_user_department where state = 1
select * from sys_department where state = 1
select * from sys_department where state = 1
select * from sys_department where state = 1
select department_code as code from sys_position_shop where 1=1 and shop_code = #{shopCode}
